title: LF: Bronze - Silver Support, pref Nami for a temp. ranked team.
body: Looking for a Bronze - Silver support, preferably someone good with Nami, to fill in for a few ranked team games. Preferably someone in ~yr 10 but anyone is welcome. Games occur usually at around 2pm during holidays for now.

replies.body: Im keen, I main support. Im pretty decent with Nami and pro with my morg. <3{{champion:25}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:26}} {{champion:143}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:12}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:3}}
